ontoProc: convenient representations of ontologies for genomic data science

Source: R/refs.R
lk_ontoProc.Rd

ontoProc: convenient representations of ontologies for genomic data science

Usage

lk_ontoProc()

Examples

if (requireNamespace("ontoProc")) {
 cl = ontoProc::getOnto('cellOnto')
 cl3k = c("CL:0000492", "CL:0001054", "CL:0000236", "CL:0000625",
    "CL:0000576", "CL:0000623", "CL:0000451", "CL:0000556")
 ontoProc::onto_plot2(cl, cl3k)
}
#> Loading required namespace: ontoProc
#> loading from cache
